scripts.test:swift: cd tauri-plugin-secure-element/ios && (swift test || echo 'Note: Swift tests require iOS simulator. Run from Xcode or use: xcodebuild test -scheme <scheme> -destination "platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15"')
scripts.test:android: cd tauri-plugin-secure-element/android && (./gradlew test || gradle test || echo 'Note: Gradle wrapper not found. Install Gradle or run from Android Studio')
scripts.test:android:instrumented: cd tauri-plugin-secure-element/android && (./gradlew connectedAndroidTest || gradle connectedAndroidTest || echo 'Note: Gradle wrapper not found. Install Gradle or run from Android Studio')
